## takeLast() function

Transducer which only yields the last `n` values. Assumes input source is finite (of course).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function takeLast<T>(n: number): Transducer<T, T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<T, T>`

## Example


```ts
[...takeLast(3, range(10))]
// [ 7, 8, 9 ]

```
